attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Overpriced telephone quiz shows and telephone vote programs and taking over the television channels. they are everywhere.  These should be limited and restricted on the gains they make from the people who do decide to vote or enter often fixed quiz show (as highlighted in the news today.) Bring back decent television to the weekend again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
